text.data: Sajin: So these are dragons... They're all slimy and gross.[end]

Sendak: The princess... she was muttering in her sleep...
She was saying, [0x24][character][0x1]...[0x22]
It also appears that the Holy Dragon Jormungand appeared in her dreams...
She says Jormungand is trying to tell us something...[end]

[character][0x1]: ...[character][0x1]. There were lots of things in my dream.
I felt... I felt you were very close by. I'm sorry for making you worry...[end]
But... I... I'm okay now.[end]
Rush: I couldn't sleep for some reason yesterday. I wonder why... Man, I'm nervous. It's hard to explain, but... I get the feeling we're doing something really big.[end]
Rush: This kingdom'll change... Maybe even this world too...[end]
Rush: Here they come...[end]

Rush: Matelite's always so rash... I can't believe that guy...
We're not just fighting, you know. I don't really know how to explain it... I'm confused...[end]

Truce: A freedom revolution... The overthrow of the royal family...
In Kahna, that would have been Matelite and [character][0x1]... That's pretty hard to imagine.[end]
Truce: It hurts... my heart hurts. I'm just a soldier, so I can only follow orders, right? I can't stop it... If I had to explain how I'm feeling right now, I would be a miserable sight.[end]
Bikkebakke: Dafila's houses are made of stone... They've begun to save their money... It'll be soon...[end]
Lady: Will you go shopping?[end]
Bikkebakke: [character][0x1]... Will we go?[end]
I like the wind of freedom. [0x28]wait[0x29] I'll buy some mushrooms! Let's go![end1]
Libero: [character][0x1]... You can feel it too, right? The wind of freedom has begun to blow through Dafila... From now on things will be difficult. Don't you give up either, [character][0x1]![end]

Battlefield Salesman: Yesterday I was caught in an embarrasing situation... Ever since then I've been trying to get along with her again...
Okay, time for shopping![end]
I want weapons. I want armor.[end1]

Battlefield Salesman: She's a nice lady, don't you think?
Okay! Time for shopping![end]
I want to see some items. I wanna see some porno mags.[end1]
Zeroshin: Mom... This time it looks like I'll make a lot of friends.[end]
Battlefield Salesman: Keep up the good work! Please put in a good word for me to my wife too![end]
Matelite: What are you goofing around for?! Let's get going! Because of our help, [character][0x1] feels better now! So where is the Holy Dragon's temple?![end]
Truce: Matelite, please listen. Dafila has become a free kingdom. Last night... a freedom revolution...[end]
Matelite: What're you talking about? Freedom and revolutions...!! They have nothing to do with us! Where is the Holy Dragon!?[end]
Truce: ... It's in the temple at the very southern end of the desert...[end]
Matelite: Did you hear that, Taicho? Lead the way![end][end]
